name: CLARITY_UCL
description: Universal Charge Lines (UCL) information. Each row represents one UCL transaction.

columns.name: UCL_ID
columns.description: The unique ID associated with the charge record.

columns.name: PATIENT_ID
columns.description: The patient the charge is associated with.

columns.name: START_INST
columns.description: The start date and time associated with the charge.

columns.name: END_INST
columns.description: The end date and time associated with the charge.

columns.name: PROV_BILL_AREA_C
columns.description: The bill area for this charge.

columns.name: PROV_BILL_AREA_C_BILL_AREA_NAME
columns.description: The record name of this bill area, financial subdivision, or financial division.
